tagline: Tharabololo ya gago ya tsotlhe mo go kgaoganngweng ga madi ka dijithale, dirasiti, le diinvoices mo Aforika Borwa.
securityMessage: Re dirisa mekgwa ya khupetso le tshireletsego ya maemo a a kwa godimo go sireletsa tshedimosetso ya gago ya matlotlo. Boikanyego jwa gago ke selo sa botlhokwa mo go rona.
learnMoreSecurity: Ithute go le Gontsi ka Tshireletsego
noScheduledPayments: Ga o na dipoelo dipe tse di rulagantsweng.
noReceiptsFound: Ga go na dirasiti dipe tse di fitlhetsweng. Simolola ka go tsenya e le nngwe!
noInvoicesYet: Ga go na diinvoices dipe. Dira e le nngwe go simolola!
financialWellnessTagline: Dikgakololo tse di botlhale tsa botshelo jo bo itekanetseng jwa matlotlo.
topFinancialTips: Dikgakololo tse di Kwa Godimo tsa Matlotlo
budgetWiselyDesc: Latela lotseno le ditshenyegelo tsa gago. Dira tekanyetso ya kgwedi le kgwedi mme o e latele go fitlhelela maikaelelo a gago a matlotlo.
saveRegularlyDesc: Le fa e le madi a mannye a a bolokwang ka metlha a ka gola thata fa nako e ntse e ya. Dira gore poloko ya gago e itiragalele fa go kgonega.
understandDebtDesc: Laola sekoloto ka tshwanelo. Rulaganya go duela dikoloto tsa merokotso e e kwa godimo pele. Tiladitshenyegelo tse di sa tlhokegeng.
investForFutureDesc: Ithute ka ga ditlhopho tse di farologaneng tsa peeletso. Simolola go sa le gale go bona molemo wa merokotso e e oketsegang.
needPersonalizedAdvice: A o Tlhoka Kgakololo e e Lebaneng le Wena?
personalizedAdviceDesc: Akanyetsa go bona mogakolodi wa matlotlo go bona kaelo e e lebaneng le maemo a gago a a rileng.
currentPlan: Gone jaanong o mo <1>Leano la Motheo</1>.
planDescription: Itumelele dipoelo tse di borethe le taolo ya dirasiti tsa dijithale.

greeting.welcomeBack: O amogetswe gape kwa sethaleng sa gago sa matlotlo!

dashboard.totalSpentThisMonth: Madi Otlhe a a Dirisitsweng Kgwedi Eno
dashboard.noRecentTransactions: Ga go na ditiriso tsa bosheng tse di ka bontshiwang.

auth.alreadyHaveAccount: O setse o na le akhaonto?
auth.forgotPasswordInstruction: Kenya aterese ya gago ya imeile mme re tla go romelela kgokagano ya go seta phasewete ya gago sesha.
auth.sendResetLink: Romela Kgokagano ya go Seta Sesha
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Imeile ya go seta phasewete sesha e rometswe. Tsweetswee tlhatlhoba poso ya gago.
auth.passwordUpdatedSuccess: Phasewete ya gago e ntšhwafaditswe ka katlego.
auth.mustBeLoggedInToUpdatePassword: O tshwanetse go bo o tsenye go ntšhwafatsa phasewete ya gago go tswa fa. Fa o lebetse phasewete ya gago, tsweetswee dirisa kgokagano ya 'O Lebetse Phasewete?' mo tsebeng ya go tsena.
auth.mustBeLoggedIn: O tshwanetse go tsena go dira tiro e.
auth.verificationEmailSent: Imeile ya tlhomamiso e rometswe kwa atereseng ya gago. Tsweetswee tobetsa kgokagano e e mo imeiling go dira gore akhaonto ya gago e bereke.
auth.changePasswordDescription: Kenya phasewete ya gago e ntšhwa fa tlase. Netefatsa gore e nonofile!
auth.changeLanguageDescription: Tlhopha puo e o e ratang ya tiriso.

toast.signupSuccessDescription: O amogetswe kwa PAYPER! Jaanong o ka tsena.
toast.signupSuccessDescriptionCheckEmail: Tsweetswee tlhatlhoba imeile ya gago go tlhomamisa akhaonto ya gago pele o tsena.

error.passwordTooShort: Phasewete e tshwanetse go nna le ditlhaka di le 6 bobotlana.
error.genericError: Go nnile le phoso e e sa lebelelwang. Tsweetswee leka gape.

supabaseErrors.Invalid login credentials: Imeile kgotsa phasewete e e sa siamang. Tsweetswee leka gape.
supabaseErrors.User already registered: Akhaonto e e nang le imeile eno e setse e le teng. Leka go tsena kgotsa dirisa 'O Lebetse Phasewete?'.
supabaseErrors.Email rate limit exceeded: Maiteko a mantsi thata. Tsweetswee leka gape moragonyana.
supabaseErrors.Password should be at least 6 characters: Phasewete e tshwanetse go nna le ditlhaka di le 6 bobotlana.
supabaseErrors.Unable to validate email address: invali: Fomete ya imeile e e sa siamang. Tsweetswee tsenya aterese ya imeile e e siameng.
supabaseErrors.For security purposes, you can only requ: Kopo ya go seta phasewete sesha e rometswe bosheng thata. Tsweetswee ema motsotso pele o leka gape.

p2p.recipientHint: Tsenya imeile kgotsa nomoro ya mogala ya moamogedi.
p2p.notePlaceholder: sek., Sa dijo tsa motshegare, Letsatsi le le monate la matsalo!
p2p.confirmPaymentDescription: Tsweetswee sekaseka dintlha pele o romela.
p2p.paymentSentSuccess: O rometse ZAR {{amount}} ka katlego go {{recipient}}!
p2p.paymentSentError: Go romela poelo go padile. Tsweetswee leka gape.

error.recipientRequired: Imeile kgotsa mogala wa moamogedi di a tlhokega.
error.invalidAmount: Tsweetswee tsenya madi a a siameng a a fetang lefela.
error.amountMustBeNumber: Madi a tshwanetse go nna nomoro.

merchantPayment.paymentSuccessMessage: O duetse ZAR {{amount}} ka katlego go {{merchant}}!

error.stripeNotLoaded: Stripe ga e ise e laolwe. Tsweetswee ema mme o leke gape.
error.paymentFailed: Poelo e padile. Tsweetswee tlhatlhoba dintlha tsa karata ya gago kgotsa leka karata e nngwe.
error.paymentNotSucceeded: Poelo ga e a atlega. Tsweetswee leka gape.
error.dbErrorAfterSuccess: Poelo e atlegile ka Stripe, mme e padile go kwadisiwa mo tsamaisong ya rona. Tsweetswee ikgolaganye le thuso.
error.failedToCreatePaymentIntent: Go padile go simolodisa poelo. Tsweetswee leka gape.

merchantPayment.securityNoteMessage: Ka maikaelelo a go supa, go dirwa ga maikaelelo a poelo go etsisiwa mo letlhakoreng la modirisi. Mo tirisong ya lefatshe la nnete, kgato eno ya botlhokwa E TSHWANETSE go dirwa ka tshireletsego mo servereng ya kwa morago go sireletsa konopo ya gago ya sephiri ya Stripe.
